name: advanced-beauty_be
description: Rest API for Advanced Beauty website bookings
author: Francisco Javier Roca

scripts.setup-db:test:create:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli seed:generate --name data-test
scripts.setup-db:development:create:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli seed:generate --name data-development
scripts.setup-db:test:push:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20220819144441-data-test --env test
scripts.setup-db:development:push:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20221206113308-data-development --env development
scripts.setup-db:production:push:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20221206113308-data-development --env production
scripts.db-test:reset: (npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20220819144441-data-test --env test)
scripts.db-development:reset: (npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env development && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env development && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20221206113308-data-development)
scripts.db-production:reset: (npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env production && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env production && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20221206113308-data-development)
